attributes.action: Stop the fees payment on nursing courses.
attributes.additional_details: This will increase the number of UK trained nurses in our hospitals and reduce the strain on employed NHS nurses and all nurses in the sector.
attributes.background:
Make school fees free for all nursing courses in United Kingdom Universities. 
This will attract more individuals to study and after studies the burden of student loans that reduces take home pay will be eliminated.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about tuition fees are a matter for individual educational institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to fully fund nursing degrees, if that's something you'd like to happen.
